title.title: we provide specialized inspection and maintenance services for Remotely Operated Vehicles (ROVs).

sections.content:
Reduced risk to personnel

 Increased efficiency and cost-effectiveness 

 Enhanced accuracy and reliability 

 Real-time data and video feedback 

 Minimized environmental impact

**Underwater Visual Inspections -** High-definition video and photography for detailed asset assessment.

 **Leak Detection -** Identifying potential leaks or damage to pipelines, tanks, or other infrastructure. 

 **Cathodic Protection -** Monitoring CP systems to ensure corrosion protection. 

 **Pipeline Surveys -** Mapping pipeline routes, detecting anomalies, and assessing condition. 

 **Platform and Jacket Inspections -** Evaluating structural integrity and identifying potential issues.

High-definition cameras 

 Sonar and acoustic sensors 

 Manipulator arms 

 Water samplers 

 Cavitation Cleaning Technique
